website_summaries.verdict: From skate to everyday activities, the Osiris Clone is a worthy addition to an arsenal of kicks. It is among the shoes from Osiris that can provide ankle protection and support. With its unique-looking design, matching it with different casual wear will not be a problem. Different colorways are also available to choose from. Apart from its subtle design, the high-top Osiris offers a comfortable ride that can be enjoyed without ruining a style.
pros: The Osiris Clone is a comfortable shoe, according to many users
A handful of customers are pleased with the sneaker’s awesome design
Compared to some DC sneakers, this shoe offers a more excellent fit as per several purchasers
A couple of buyers have mentioned that the Osiris Clone can accommodate people with wide feet
This high-top sneaker offers excellent arch support, especially to those with Achilles tendon injury, according to a few
A couple of wearers have pointed out that the Osiris Clone is perfect for weightlifting, apart from skating
A few have stated that they receive compliments every time they use this kick
It is available in different colorways that are adorned by some shoppers
cons: Plenty of reviewers have complained against the durability of the Osiris Clone
The sole fell apart easily and quickly
A few customers have observed that this shoe runs small

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute, comfy, and bright! I’m a 5.5 in women’s sneakers and ordered a 4
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these 3 times now since I got them and I can find ZERO things I don't like thus far. Durability is up in the air as yet but these shoes seem to be high quality. I love the color and style. Amazing comments from everyone who sees them and they can see them from orbit. lol A++++++
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Messenger

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, comfy, awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you very much, these are my wife’s dream shoes and she’s wanted them since she was 14. For Over 11 years she has wanted shoes just like these. The fit her perfect and she adores them.
customer_reviews.author: Cody DeLisa

customer_reviews.title: Laces for days! Cool shoes though.
customer_reviews.text: these shoes are really cool looking. but the laces are like 5 feet long. what are we supposed to do with all that lace? i tried looking up video on how to lace them with all of that and found nothing. might just need new laces. but really good looking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love love these shoes. The Osiris site didn’t have my size but thank goodness I checked Amazon. They seem to run a bit small but they are still awesome. The shoes arrived fast and in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.author: Tenisha Phipps

customer_reviews.title: All hail Osiris!
customer_reviews.text: I am already in love with the Osiris Clone (Black and White) skate shoes <3. I am a size 8.5 in women's shoes and the size 7 fit perfect! It was just tight enough and fits like a glove. The skull designs on the sides and back of the shoe are so crisp in person, and the logo/name on the tongue of the shoe looks great too (there is even a logo on the bottom of the shoe, plus the skull design is on the inside of the shoe)! I also included a photo of the box, which features some awesome tattoo-inspired artwork.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Morales

customer_reviews.title: shoes
customer_reviews.text: these shoes have rubber coasting on outside of them so they don't get dirty.also the soles are not falling off.the siver ones however I ordered fell apart in matter of weeks get the ones with the enamel on them
customer_reviews.author: Damen Scott sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Was great to find these at a decent price. They are same quality as their older styles a few years back. Great fit, not super comfortable for someone with high arched feet. They are generally a skate shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Antaya

customer_reviews.title: my son and I had been searching for a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Finally a nice pair of Osiris skate shoes in size 13! they arrived quickly and appear to be of good quality. the pattern is well done. My son is thrilled! we have been looking for a pair he likes, in his size, for nearly a year.
customer_reviews.author: mgr1

customer_reviews.title: Osiris shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are awesome, except the fact that the shoe laces are 10 feet long that is a bit excessive in my opinion, my 6 ft 8 in grand father can use them as a jump rope how am I supposed to skate with laces hanging down to the ground getting caught in my trucks and wheels. However the design on the shoes is great I like that they are canvas and leather
customer_reviews.author: mayle1982

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes for what I do
customer_reviews.text: I honestly didnt know it would have a reflective type material but these shoes look really sharp. Love them. Had to shorten the laces by a foot but other than that they are great and I have always been an osiris fan since I was young. Have so many pairs of them I should be sponsored 😀
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Blume

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my nephew. He loves them. They fit great and look great.
customer_reviews.author: C Rose

customer_reviews.title: Brother loves his shoes
customer_reviews.text: They fit well comfy and my brother loves them. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Definitely neon green
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes..... Bright green for sure, I've had so many people comment on the color, they either love it or are surprised at how neon green they are..... I own the neon pink ones too....
customer_reviews.author: Tobi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It was excellent I was very pleased when It arrived
customer_reviews.author: Creastine wells

customer_reviews.title: Shiny!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t know they were made of reflecting material. Now, they’re even cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Tahoe Ray Kamman

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: These kicks are sure to turn some heads also these shoes and laces are perfect for doing shoe lace art like a star shape...google it!
customer_reviews.author: Moix

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. Fall apart quickly. Way too long laces.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are awesome. Only reason I’m giving a 4 star is because, 1) they fall apart pretty quick. This is the third pair of Osiris we’ve bought, but they’re the only skate shoes which are made with neon green (my partners favorite color). And 2) do the laces reeeeeeeally need to be two miles long, each?!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, like green is my favorite color and these are bright and loud just like I wanted. Osiris shoes are always comfortable and fit just right
customer_reviews.author: Franklin M

customer_reviews.title: Osiris Shoes are Awesome
customer_reviews.text: First off Osiris is my all time favorite shoe brand so I have a pretty biased opinion of the product. Shoes fit perfectly, look amazing and came in a super quick time. I've had them for a few days now and am super happy with the product. Thanks a ton!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Trill

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter.. she has wide feet and they were a little tight but we’re fine after a day of breaking them in. Great condition and package was safe and sound! She absolutely loves them.. she is a size 8 in woman, I ordered a size 6 in men :)
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Skate shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend. He fell in love with them. They are comfortable and stylish. They were packaged with care and we received them quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Bneely13

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They are perfect. The only thing was the shoe size converter from men's to women's was either off or the sizes for these shoes is off. Not sure which it is. But the shoes themselves are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Julie G

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are great laces are not
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable shoes that fit well. Only problem is they give you laces that are so long, that you could lace em up twice. So I have to buy new laces for every pair.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Turner

customer_reviews.title: Get a size bigger than usual
customer_reviews.text: The fitments a bit weird but after a week of wearing them as always the most comfortable shoes iv ever owned
customer_reviews.author: kyle jividen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Very comfortable and the design was much better then I expected! Fit well and are my go to shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit..
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit perfect...and look exactly as advertized... I am satisfied with my order and would reccomend these shoes...
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Hot Pink Heaven
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with these shoes. I've always been a fan of the clunkier skate shoe, and Osiris knows how to deliver the goods.
customer_reviews.author: Fetopsy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great quality shoes. I didn't realize that black shoes had some cool designs on them that the picture didn't show. Over all I'm happy with my purchase. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Tony E.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, great look - I can’t say enough good things about these shoes
customer_reviews.author: Briana S.

customer_reviews.title: Great design and quality
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with my purchase. Shoe fits perfectly and the design is really amazing. Excellent quality too! I love them!
customer_reviews.author: andreeaM

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the size.
customer_reviews.text: I dislike it a technical problem with my phone chooses the wrong size.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Tiiigghhht
customer_reviews.text: I love them .. I love the big tongue on them .. fits my style
customer_reviews.author: Michaelia Raffa

customer_reviews.title: Stole my money
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are to small and amazon won't let me return for a different size.
customer_reviews.author: Adam D.

customer_reviews.title: For the price they’re perfect
customer_reviews.text: They’re perfect. I missed these shoes. Very comfortable, and the style is so me.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Cooper

product_meta.title: Osiris Men's Clone Skate Shoe
product_meta.description: Often imitated, never duplicated, the clone is keeping Osiris one step ahead of the competition.
feature_bullets: Iconic styling with reinforced high abrasion areas for superior durability
Lightweight padded tongue and collar for added comfort and support
